price: If you fear betrayal from any people, throw their treaty back at them openly[34], for Allah does not like the treacherous.
arabic: وَإِمَّا تَخَافَنَّ مِن قَوۡمٍ خِيَانَةٗ فَٱنۢبِذۡ إِلَيۡهِمۡ عَلَىٰ سَوَآءٍۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُحِبُّ ٱلۡخَآئِنِينَ
footnotes: [34] i.e., announce to them its dissolution so that you both be on the same footing.
